setup-worktree: npm run type-check || tsc --noEmit || echo 'No type-check script configured'
npm run test -- run || vitest run || echo 'No tests configured yet'
echo '✅ Worktree setup complete! All quality gates validated.'
validate: npm run test -- run || vitest run
echo '✅ All validation passed - ready to commit!'
test-only: npm run test -- run || vitest run
pre-commit: npm run test -- run || vitest run
echo '✅ Pre-commit validation complete - green checks achieved!'
